sentences.en: Acupuncture was practised in China as long ago as the third millennium BC.
sentences.cn: 中国早在公元前3,000年就已开始采用针灸疗法。

sentences.en: By 10,000 BC, most of mankind was at the Neolithic level.
sentences.cn: 到公元前10000年, 大部分人类已经处于新石器时代的水平.

sentences.en: By 1000 BC waves of invaders began to assail the land.
sentences.cn: 到公元前约1000年,埃及遭受到蜂拥而来的入侵者的掠夺.

sentences.en: By the first century BC, Buddhism was in danger of fragmenting into small sects.
sentences.cn: 到公元前1世纪时，佛教面临着被分化成一些小派别的危险。

sentences.en: Greek playwright back in 500 BC. Many historians consider him the father of Greek tragedies.
sentences.cn: 公元前500年时的希腊剧作家。许多历史学家认为他是希腊悲剧之父。

sentences.en: Sennacherib's grandson Assurbanipal did actually conquer Egypt in 670 BC.
sentences.cn: 塞纳克里布的孙子亚瑟巴尼帕尔确实在公元前670年攻克埃及.

sentences.en: Soon after 2000 BC, the people of Crete began building towns.
sentences.cn: 公元前2000年后不久, 克里特人开始修筑城市.

sentences.en: The archaeologists found a house built around 300 BC, with a basement and attic.
sentences.cn: 考古学家发现了一座建于公元前300年左右的带地下室和阁楼的房子。

sentences.en: The brooch dates back to the fourth century BC.
sentences.cn: 这枚胸针的历史可以追溯到公元前4世纪。

sentences.en: The first significant civilizations of Europe formed in the second millennium BC.
sentences.cn: 欧洲第一个重要的文明出现在公元前第二世纪。

sentences.en: The statue has been dated as 5 th century BC.
sentences.cn: 这个雕像的年代为公元前5世纪.

sentences.en: The stone monument is believed to be erected near 2500 BC though there is no concrete proof the origin.
sentences.cn: 尽管没有充分的证据，但人们相信这座石碑在公元前2500左右就被竖立起来了。

sentences.en: The temple was destroyed in the violent eruption of 1470 BC.
sentences.cn: 庙宇在公元前1470年猛烈的火山爆发中摧毁了.

sentences.en: There they remained until Cyrus took Babylon ( 538 BC ).
sentences.cn: 他们一直留在那里,直到居留士攻占巴比伦 ( 公元前538年 ).

sentences.en: This literature appears in history in the fourth or fifth century BC.
sentences.cn: 这一文献于公元前4世纪或公元前5世纪出现在历史上.

sentences.en: This play was first performed in 411 BC.
Those were the halcyon days of Athens ( fifth century BC ) when she produced her finest poetry and drama, architecture and sculpture.
sentences.cn: 公元5世纪为雅典的太平盛世.雅典最优秀的诗歌、戏剧 、 建筑和雕刻均产生于这一时期.

trans.tran_cn: before Christ 公元前（基督教会历法用）

trans.tran_en: (before Christ) used after a date to show that it was before the birth of Christ
